\input fontinst.sty
\needsfontinstversion{1.926}

%% regular width
\transformfont {pcrr8r}  {\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrr8a}}}
\transformfont {pcrro8r} {\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrro8a}}}
\transformfont {pcrb8r}  {\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrb8a}}}
\transformfont {pcrbo8r} {\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrbo8a}}}

%% narrow width (condensed by 0.85)
\transformfont {pcrr8rn} {\xscalefont{850}{\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrr8a}}}}
\transformfont {pcrro8rn}{\xscalefont{850}{\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrro8a}}}}
\transformfont {pcrb8rn} {\xscalefont{850}{\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrb8a}}}}
\transformfont {pcrbo8rn}{\xscalefont{850}{\reencodefont{8r}{\fromafm{pcrbo8a}}}}

\installfonts
\installfamily{T1}{pcr}{}
\installfont {pcrr8t}  {pcrr8r,newlatin}  {t1} {T1}{pcr}{m}{n}{}
\installfont {pcrrc8t} {pcrr8r,newlatin}  {t1c}{T1}{pcr}{m}{sc}{}
\installfont {pcrro8t} {pcrro8r,newlatin} {t1} {T1}{pcr}{m}{sl}{}
\installfont {pcrr8tn} {pcrr8rn,newlatin} {t1} {T1}{pcr}{c}{n} {}
\installfont {pcrrc8tn}{pcrr8rn,newlatin} {t1c}{T1}{pcr}{c}{sc}{}
\installfont {pcrro8tn}{pcrro8rn,newlatin}{t1} {T1}{pcr}{c}{sl}{}
\installfont {pcrb8t}  {pcrb8r,newlatin}  {t1} {T1}{pcr}{mb}{n}{}
\installfont {pcrbc8t} {pcrb8r,newlatin}  {t1c}{T1}{pcr}{mb}{sc}{}
\installfont {pcrbo8t} {pcrbo8r,newlatin} {t1} {T1}{pcr}{mb}{sl}{}
\installfont {pcrb8tn} {pcrb8rn,newlatin} {t1} {T1}{pcr}{cb}{n} {}
\installfont {pcrbc8tn}{pcrb8rn,newlatin} {t1c}{T1}{pcr}{cb}{sc}{}
\installfont {pcrbo8tn}{pcrbo8rn,newlatin}{t1} {T1}{pcr}{cb}{sl}{}
\endinstallfonts

\bye
